scripts.build: tsc -p ./ && cp -r src/styles dist/styles && cat dist/scaffoldRenderers/helpers.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/designPackTokens.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/statusCard.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/proposal.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/preflight.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/execution.js dist/scaffoldRenderers/styles.js dist/components/ScaffoldCard.js > dist/components/ScaffoldCard.bundle.js
